Reviews.Title: Advertised as UNLOCKED, but it wasn't.
Reviews.Author: Lisa J Kohl
Reviews.Content: Not much more to add other than I feel cheated.  I ordered the phone to use it with a pay-as-you-go sim abroad, and when I got there, I tried sims from 4 different companies and the conclusion was always the same: "it doesn't work because the phone is NOT unlocked".  Ended up having to buy a new one on the spot.  Really annoying, expensive, and unfair experience.

Reviews.Title: GOOD AND SIMPLE, THAT IS LIFE.
Reviews.Author: cleiton
Reviews.Content: FOR PEOPLE THAT LIKE SOMETHING SIMPLE AND GOOD, I RECOMMEND IT. EVEN THE COLOR AND THE HARMONY ARE TOTALY AWESOME.

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM 850/1900
Phonebook: 1000 entries, Call Records: 10 dialed, 10 received, 10 missed calls
Card Slot: microSD, up to 2 GB supported
Camera: VGA, 640x480 pixels, SMS, EMS, MMS. Browser: WAP 2.0/xHTML, Stereo FM radio with RDS. MP3 player
Standard battery, Li-Ion 940 mAh (BQ50). Talk Time: Up to 9 h, Stand-by Time: Up to 400 h
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola W396 GSM 850/1900 Unlocked Cell Phone with Camera, MP3 Player, FM Radio, and MicroSD Slot--International Version with Warranty (Black)
